response.original_title: Colts vs. Patriots - AFC Championship Game
response.overview: In this classic matchup, Tom Brady and the Patriots seemed to be on their way to avenging their regular season loss as they jumped out to an early 21-3 lead. However, Peyton Manning led Indianpolis back in the largest comeback ever in an AFC Championship game. The Colts would go on to win Super Bowl XLI.
response.title: Colts vs. Patriots - AFC Championship Game
